name: domtastic
description: Small, fast, and modular DOM and event library for modern browsers.

scripts.bundle: browserify src -ds domtastic | undefaultify domtastic $ | exorcist dist/domtastic.js.map > dist/domtastic.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle && cd dist && uglifyjs --in-source-map domtastic.js.map --source-map domtastic.min.js.map --source-map-include-sources --screw-ie8 -mco domtastic.min.js
scripts.build-release: npm run build && npm run transpile
scripts.complexity: npm run transpile && cd dist/commonjs && plato -r -d ../../complexity --jshint ../../.jshintrc .
scripts.coverage: npm run bundle && istanbul instrument dist/domtastic.js > dist/domtastic.instrumented.js && mocha-phantomjs ./test/index.html?cov -R ./test/lib/istanbul-reporter.js --file ./coverage/coverage.json && istanbul report --root ./coverage/
scripts.benchmark: npm run build && benchrunner benchmark/init.js benchmark/class.js benchmark/construct.js benchmark/dom.js benchmark/selector.js
